rules_text:
Enchant legendary creature or planeswalker
Vanishing 1 [i](This permanent enters with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Enchanted permanent has protection from everything. This effect doesn’t remove Fantasy Nature.
[i]Last Word[/i] – As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard two cards. If you do, it enters with two additional time counters on it.
